languages.text: "Думаю, это лишь первое из открытий, что нам уготованы". {n}Она томно растягивается на постели.{/n} "Каждая новая встреча сулит возможность узнать тебя лучше и... раскрыться самой. Исследуем наши тела и души, чтобы достичь полного единения".

traits.locale_text: "Думаю, это лишь первое из открытий, что нам уготованы". {n}Она томно растягивается на постели.{/n} "Каждая новая встреча сулит возможность узнать тебя лучше и... раскрыться самой. Давай исследуем наши тела и души, дабы достичь полного единения".

languages.text: "I believe this is but the first of many revelations we will receive." {n}She stretches languidly on the bed.{/n} "Each new encounter promises the opportunity to know you better and to... reveal myself to you. We will explore our bodies and souls to attain total unity."
languages.original_text: "Думаю, это лишь первое из открытий, что нам уготованы". {n}Она томно растягивается на постели.{/n} "Каждая новая встреча сулит возможность узнать тебя лучше и... раскрыться самой. Исследуем наши тела и души, чтобы достичь полного единения".

traits.locale_text: "I believe this is but the first of many revelations we will receive." {n}She stretches languidly on the bed.{/n} "Each new encounter promises the opportunity to know you better and to... reveal myself to you. We will explore our bodies and souls to attain total unity."

"I believe this is but the first of many revelations we will receive." {n}She stretches languidly on the bed.{/n} "Each new encounter promises the opportunity to know you better and to... reveal myself to you. We will explore our bodies and souls to attain total unity."

"I believe this is but the first of many revelations we will receive." {n}She stretches languidly on the bed.{/n} "Each new encounter promises the opportunity to know you better and to... reveal myself to you. We will explore our bodies and souls to attain total unity."

"I believe this is but the first of many revelations we will receive." {n}She stretches languidly on the bed.{/n} "Each new encounter promises the opportunity to know you better and to... reveal myself to you. We will explore our bodies and souls to attain total unity."

"I believe this is but the first of many revelations we will receive." {n}She stretches languidly on the bed.{/n} "Each new encounter promises the opportunity to know you better and to... reveal myself to you. We will explore our bodies and souls to attain total unity."

languages.text: «Creo que ha sido la primera de muchas revelaciones que tendremos juntos». {n}Kibellah se despereza lánguidamente sobre la cama.{/n} «Cada nuevo encuentro supone una oportunidad de conocerle mejor y de... mostrarle como soy realmente. Exploraremos nuestros cuerpos y almas hasta alcanzar una unidad total».
languages.original_text: "I believe this is but the first of many revelations we will receive." {n}She stretches languidly on the bed.{/n} "Each new encounter promises the opportunity to know you better and to... reveal myself to you. We will explore our bodies and souls to attain total unity."

traits.locale_text: «Creo que ha sido la primera de muchas revelaciones que tendremos juntos». {n}Kibellah se despereza lánguidamente sobre la cama.{/n} «Cada nuevo encuentro supone una oportunidad de conocerle mejor y de... mostrarle como soy realmente. Exploraremos nuestros cuerpos y almas hasta alcanzar una unidad total».

languages.text: 「これは、私たちが受けることになる多くの啓示の最初の一歩に過ぎません」{n}彼女はベッドの上で気だるそうに伸びをした。{/n}「新しく出会うたび、あなたをもっと知る機会が与えられ、私自身をさらけ出すことができる。私たちは一体化をするためにも、肉体と魂を探求を続けるのです」
languages.original_text: "I believe this is but the first of many revelations we will receive." {n}She stretches languidly on the bed.{/n} "Each new encounter promises the opportunity to know you better and to... reveal myself to you. We will explore our bodies and souls to attain total unity."

traits.locale_text: 「これは、私たちが受けることになる多くの啓示の最初の一歩に過ぎません」{n}彼女はベッドの上で気だるそうに伸びをした。{/n}「新しく出会うたび、あなたをもっと知る機会が与えられ、私自身をさらけ出すことができる。私たちは一体化をするためにも、肉体と魂を探求を続けるのです」

languages.text: “我相信，我们未来还会有许许多多次启示。”{n}她慵懒地躺在床上，伸展着身体。{/n}“每一次新的结合，都会让我更好地了解你，更好地……向你展示我的本质。我们会探索彼此的肉体与灵魂，实现彻底的统一。”
languages.original_text: "I believe this is but the first of many revelations we will receive." {n}She stretches languidly on the bed.{/n} "Each new encounter promises the opportunity to know you better and to... reveal myself to you. We will explore our bodies and souls to attain total unity."

traits.locale_text: “我相信，我们未来还会有许许多多次启示。”{n}她慵懒地躺在床上，伸展着身体。{/n}“每一次新的结合，都会让我更好地了解你，更好地……向你展示我的本质。我们会探索彼此的肉体与灵魂，实现彻底的统一。”

languages.text: "Ich glaube, das war nur die erste von vielen Offenbarungen, die uns erwarten." {n}Sie räkelt sich müde auf dem Bett.{/n} "Jede weitere Begegnung ist eine Möglichkeit, Euch besser kennen zu lernen ... und mich Euch zu offenbaren. Wir werden unsere Körper und Seele erkunden, um vollständige Einheit zu erlangen."
languages.original_text: "I believe this is but the first of many revelations we will receive." {n}She stretches languidly on the bed.{/n} "Each new encounter promises the opportunity to know you better and to... reveal myself to you. We will explore our bodies and souls to attain total unity."

traits.locale_text: "Ich glaube, das war nur die erste von vielen Offenbarungen, die uns erwarten." {n}Sie räkelt sich müde auf dem Bett.{/n} "Jede weitere Begegnung ist eine Möglichkeit, Euch besser kennen zu lernen ... und mich Euch zu offenbaren. Wir werden unsere Körper und Seele erkunden, um vollständige Einheit zu erlangen."

languages.text: « Je suis convaincue que ce n'est que le début d'une longue série de révélations. {n}Elle s'étire langoureusement sur le lit.{/n} Chaque nouveau rendez-vous sera pour moi l'occasion de mieux vous connaître... et de m'ouvrir à vous. Nous explorerons nos corps et nos âmes pour atteindre l'unité absolue. »
languages.original_text: "I believe this is but the first of many revelations we will receive." {n}She stretches languidly on the bed.{/n} "Each new encounter promises the opportunity to know you better and to... reveal myself to you. We will explore our bodies and souls to attain total unity."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis convaincue que ce n'est que le début d'une longue série de révélations. {n}Elle s'étire langoureusement sur le lit.{/n} Chaque nouveau rendez-vous sera pour moi l'occasion de mieux vous connaître... et de m'ouvrir à vous. Nous explorerons nos corps et nos âmes pour atteindre l'unité absolue. »

languages.text: "Bunun daha nice keşfin başlangıcı olduğunu düşünüyorum." {n}Yatakta ağır ağır geriniyor.{/n} "Her yeni karşılaşma, seni daha iyi tanıma ve... Kendimi sana daha iyi tanıtma fırsatı sunuyor. Baştan aşağı bir bütün olmak için bedenlerimizi ve ruhlarımızı keşfedeceğiz."
languages.original_text: "I believe this is but the first of many revelations we will receive." {n}She stretches languidly on the bed.{/n} "Each new encounter promises the opportunity to know you better and to... reveal myself to you. We will explore our bodies and souls to attain total unity."
